definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: The executioner had never seen anything like this!
sentences.chinese: 刽子手从来没见过这种情形。

sentences.english: The previous hangman reportedly quit in 2005.
sentences.chinese: 据报道以前的刽子手已于2005年离职。

sentences.english: Eavesdrop on the conversation between Mrs. Greenleaf and her henchman.
sentences.chinese: 窃听与夫人和她的刽子手格林里夫交谈。

sentences.english: They told the executioner to let him go, and pardoned him.
sentences.chinese: 就让刽子手停止行刑，赦免了王延寿。

sentences.english: Know track for autumn, evergreen to learn from master to do the executioner but was refused.
sentences.chinese: 知秋追来，向常绿拜师学做刽子手但被拒绝。

sentences.english: You've heard the executioners sing joyfully.
sentences.chinese: 你听过刽子手得意的歌唱。

sentences.english: Bush and if so how can either of them sleep at night knowing they are torturers .
sentences.chinese: 如果是的话他们两个刽子手夜里怎么睡得着？

sentences.english: Frequently both victims and the executioner were drunk.
sentences.chinese: 他是幕府将军的刽子手。

sentences.english: Then the executioner put something over her eyes.
sentences.chinese: 接着，那刽子手用东西遮住了她的眼睛。

sentences.english: She could not walk to the block, so the executioner helped her.
sentences.chinese: 她不能走到木台那儿，于是那刽子手拉她过去。

sentences.english: Now get out of my sight, before I save the headsman the trouble.
sentences.chinese: 现在滚出我的视线，否则我会帮刽子手省了麻烦。

sentences.english: 'Off with his head! ' she said, without even looking round.
sentences.chinese: 刽子手好像离弦的箭似的跑去了。

sentences.english: A change in technique for the world's busiest executioners?
sentences.chinese: 世界上最忙刽子手的一个技术改变？

sentences.english: The executioner put down his axe and stood quietly.
sentences.chinese: 刽子手放下了斧子，一言不发地站着。
医生是施治者，而非刽子手。

definition: prisoner that awaits execution/convict sentenced to death/someone on death row
debts of blood crying out for retribution
to execute by firing squad/same as 槍斃|枪毙
lit. strung through and filled with evil (idiom); filled with extreme evil/replete with vice/guilty of monstrous crimes
the lingering death/the death of a thousand cuts (old form of capital punishment)
to hang (i.e. execute by hanging)/to strangle
